text: Evarkal, maryamutaiya makan masihai allahtan enru kurukinranaro avarkal niccayamaka nirakarippavarkalakave irukkinranar. Akave, (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka: â€˜â€˜Maryamutaiya makan masihaiyum, avarutaiya tayaiyum, ulakattilulla (marra) anaivaraiyum allah alittuvitak karutinal (avanait tatukka) evantan ciritenum cakti peruvan? (Enenral,) vanankal, pumi innum ivarrukku mattiyilulla anaittin atci allahvukkuriyate! Avan virumpiyatai (virumpiyapati) pataikkiran. Allah anaittin mitum mika perarralutaiyavan
